title: Textile, ca. 1780
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery of colored silks and chenille; applique of needlemade net on satin weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Whtie satin ornamented with embroidery in colored silks and chenille and needlemade net; design of scrollign lines, flowers and flowering vines. Selvage: green stripe.
